aggregateInputConfigs.name: chainEndpoints
aggregateInputConfigs.label: JSON RPC Endpoints
aggregateInputConfigs.textUnderName: To support a particular blockchain, you need to define an endpoint for it. This config is a map from a chain's name to its endpoint URL and rate limit. Chain names must match the keys from botiq/ethers-base.js and the URLs must have any access token embedded (Ankr has some free endpoint URLs).

aggregateInputConfigs.name: telegramAccessToken
aggregateInputConfigs.textUnderName: This is the password that the Bot Father gives you when you create a Telegram bot.
